item.title: Quiz: Biological Mechanisms of Reward
item.description: _____________ refers to the concentration of a drug within brain tissue that is able to bind to receptors.

item.title: Biological Mechanisms of Reward
item.description: Dependence Liability Dependence liability of different drugs depends on their bioavailability in the brain (concentration within the brain tissue that is able to bind to receptors)
